units.name: 10-static.network
units.contents:
[Match]
Name=ens192

[Network]
DNS=127.0.0.1
DNS=8.8.8.8
DNS=8.8.4.4
Domains=
Address=10.0.0.10/24
Gateway=10.0.0.1

units.name: vmtoolsd.service
units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=VMware Tools Agent
Documentation=https://github.com/vmware/open-vm-tools
ConditionVirtualization=vmware

[Service]
ExecStartPre=/usr/bin/ln -sfT /usr/share/oem/vmware-tools /etc/vmware-tools
ExecStart=/usr/share/oem/bin/vmtoolsd
TimeoutStopSec=5
TimeoutStartSec=5
PrivateTmp=true
Restart=always

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target

units.name: dnsmasq.service
units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Dnsmasq
After=systemd-networkd-wait-online.service
Requires=systemd-networkd-wait-online.service

[Service]
ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker run --rm --net=host --name=dnsmasq -p 53:53/tcp -p 53:53/udp -v /etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf:/etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf:ro --cap-add=NET_ADMIN andyshinn/dnsmasq:2.75 --log-facility=- --conf-file=/etc/dnsmasq/dnsmasq.conf --log-queries -d
ExecStop=/usr/bin/docker stop dnsmasq

# Ensure log messages are correctly tagged in the system log.
SyslogIdentifier=dnsmasq

# Auto-Restart the container after a crash.
Restart=always
RestartSec=30
StartLimitBurst=3
StartLimitIntervalSec=160
LimitNOFILE=65536
TasksMax=infinity
TimeoutSec=30

[Install]
# make sure service is started after docker is up
WantedBy=multi-user.target

units.name: consul.service
units.contents:
[Unit]
After=docker.device
Requires=docker.service

[Service]
ExecStartPre=/bin/sh -c 'until ping -c1 10.0.0.1; do sleep 1; done;'
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker rm -f consul

ExecStart=docker run --net=host --rm --name=consul -v consul-volume:/consul/data consul:1.5.2 agent -server -ui -bootstrap -datacenter nyb1 -bind="10.0.0.10" -client="10.0.0.10" -recursor 8.8.8.8 -recursor 8.8.4.4

ExecStop=/usr/bin/docker stop consul
# Ensure log messages are correctly tagged in the system log.
SyslogIdentifier=consul
# Auto-Restart the container after a crash.
Restart=always

[Install]
# make sure service is started after docker is up
WantedBy=docker.service

units.name: nomad.service
units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Nomad
Documentation=https://nomadproject.io/docs/
After=download-nomad.service
Requires=docker.service

[Service]
KillMode=process
KillSignal=SIGINT
ExecStartPre=/bin/sh -c 'until ping -c1 10.0.0.1; do sleep 1; done;'
ExecStart=/opt/bin/nomad agent -config /etc/nomad/nomad.hcl
ExecReload=/bin/kill -HUP $MAINPID
Restart=on-failure
RestartSec=30
StartLimitBurst=3
StartLimitIntervalSec=160
LimitNOFILE=65536
TasksMax=infinity
TimeoutSec=30

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target

units.name: unlink-resolved.service
units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Unlink resolved
# Define dependencies
After=systemd-resolved.service
Requires=systemd-resolved.service

[Service]
Type=oneshot
ExecStartPre=-/bin/unlink /etc/resolv.conf
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/touch /etc/resolv.conf
ExecStart=/usr/bin/bash -c '/usr/bin/echo "nameserver 127.0.0.1" > /etc/resolv.conf'
ExecStart=/usr/bin/bash -c '/usr/bin/echo "nameserver 8.8.8.8" >> /etc/resolv.conf'
ExecStart=/usr/bin/bash -c '/usr/bin/echo "nameserver 8.8.4.4" >> /etc/resolv.conf'
RemainAfterExit=true

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target

units.name: var-vm-swapfile1.swap
units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Turn on swap
Requires=create-swapfile.service
After=create-swapfile.service

[Swap]
What=/var/vm/swapfile1

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target

units.name: create-swapfile.service
units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Create a swapfile
RequiresMountsFor=/var
ConditionPathExists=!/var/vm/swapfile1

[Service]
Type=oneshot
ExecStart=/usr/bin/mkdir -p /var/vm
ExecStart=/usr/bin/fallocate -l 1024m /var/vm/swapfile1
ExecStart=/usr/bin/chmod 600 /var/vm/swapfile1
ExecStart=/usr/sbin/mkswap /var/vm/swapfile1
RemainAfterExit=true

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
